mapper.insert: insert into spring_crud (title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from spring_crud where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update spring_crud set title =#{title}, content =#{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from spring_crud where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
